• HOME
                                


                                    Kick start your career with Adobe Digital
                                

                                     Experience courses and certifications
                                






                                    The Adobe Digital Experience Certification Program is designed to help you
demonstrate that you can use Adobe Experience Cloud products effectively and
with skill.


Adobe Experience Cloud is a suite of digital marketing solutions that enables
businesses to deliver personalized customer experiences across multiple
channels, including web, mobile, email, and social media. 

Start your certification journey with on-demand courses that teach you
the skills you need to level up your career. 





Sign in


View courses

• Access on demand courses
• Earn downloadable certificates
• Free certification preparation resources

• How to get started
• Technical certifications by solution
• How to get certified

• Connect in community forums
• Become a Subject Matter Expert
• Access community news and events

professional.description:
H5: 0 items

H4: Set yourself apart with Adobe certifications

H2: Join our community

H2: Take a course

H3: Stay up to date with all things Adobe and beyond

H4: Documentation

H4: Certifications

H4: Experience League Community

H4: Support

H4: Resources

H4: Adobe Certification Portal Account

Elevate your expertise with the Adobe Digital ExperienceCertification Program

Worldwide, 87% of IT employees surveyed possess at least one valid certification. Make sure you’re competitive in the rapidly growing field of digital experience by becoming Adobe certified.

The Adobe Digital Experience Certification Program offers over fifty certifications in Adobe Experience Cloud applications. Our study resources and training courses mean you can get started no matter your experience level.

Adobe Certified Expert, Master, and Professional certification exams measure your skills and expert-level proficiency with Adobe products.

You can take part in the Adobe Digital Experience Community at any point on your learning or
                                certification journey. Post in our forums, become a Subject Matter Expert, provide feedback
                                on our program, test new courses - tons of opportunities are waiting for you!

Adobe's digital experience courses help you acquire the essential skills you need to become
                                job-ready.
                                These courses provide the knowledge and expertise required to prepare effectively for Adobe
                                certification, empowering you to kickstart your career.

Have questions or comments? Visit our support section.

Copyright © 2025 Adobe.
                                        All Rights Reserved. /

courses.description:
H5: 0 items

H4: New and featured courses

H4: What we offer

H2: Get Adobe certified

H2: Join our community

H2: Take a course

H3: Stay up to date with all things Adobe and beyond

H4: Documentation

H4: Certifications

H4: Experience League Community

H4: Support

H4: Resources

H4: Adobe Certification Portal Account

Take the next step with Adobe Digital Experience courses

Adobe courses both enhance your job skills and help prepare you for a certification exam. Achieve your learning goals at your own pace with self-guided modules and use your knowledge to work toward a certification.

Explore our library of courses created by Adobe experts.

Adobe Experience ManagerSites For Developers -Professional

Adobe Experience Manager Sites is the industry-leading content management system that empowers any m...

Adobe Journey Optimizer forDevelopers – Expert

After completing this course you will be able to: Differentiate between batch, streaming and...

Adobe Commerce forDevelopers - Professional

Adobe Commerce is a flexible and scalable commerce platform that lets you create personalized B2B an...

Adobe Journey OptimizerFoundations

At the conclusion of this course, you will be able to:​Discuss the importance of customer jour...

We are adding to our course offerings all the time - check back as we expand to higher-level courses.

Stand out in today's competitive job market by becoming Adobe certified. Gain
                                industry-recognized
                                certifications that validate your skills and expertise in Adobe's suite of digital
                                experience tools.
                                Unlock your potential and embark on a journey towards success today!

You can take part in the Adobe Digital Experience Community at any point on your learning or
                                certification journey. Post in our forums, become a Subject Matter Expert, provide feedback
                                on our program, test new courses - tons of opportunities are waiting for you!

Adobe's digital experience courses help you acquire the essential skills you need to become
                                job-ready.
                                These courses provide the knowledge and expertise required to prepare effectively for Adobe
                                certification, empowering you to kickstart your career.

Have questions or comments? Visit our support section.

TABLE:
Foundation | Professional | Expert | Master
Recommendedexperience | No experience | 0-12 months of experience | 1-3 years of experience | 3-5 years of experience
Courses | Available Now | Available Now | Coming Soon | Coming Soon
Course Leveldescription | Designed for individuals who are new to Adobe platforms and solutions and want to get a high-level overview of the products and their features | Designed for individuals preparing to take Professional level certification exams, these courses provide an in-depth look at product features and include hands-on activities. | Coming Soon | Coming Soon

You may schedule an exam up to 60 days in the future. If you schedule within the next 24 hours, you must pay a $10 fee. 

You may request accommodations up to 7 days before your exam appointment.


Resources:

You may reschedule up to 24 hours before your exam appointment without having to pay a fee. If you reschedule less than 24 hours before your exam appointment time, you must pay a $5 fee. 

  You may cancel up to 24 hours before your exam appointment and retain your voucher. If you cancel less than 24 hours before your exam appointment time, you forfeit your voucher.

If you are a partner and your certification history is incorrect on the Solution Partner Portal, please submit a ticket through SPP. (To review your certification history on the Solution Partner Portal, go to your SPP profile and navigate to the Enablement section.)

You may request accommodations after scheduling your exam appointment. On that same scheduling page, click on the Request accommodations button to select your desired accommodations. The Adobe team will review your request and may ask for additional information. 

  You may request accommodations up to 7 days before your exam appointment.

If you would like to pay for a voucher ahead of time, would like to purchase vouchers in bulk, or are an admin purchasing vouchers for your company: 

Go to the Adobe Certification Voucher Center.
Under the Purchase vouchers tab, you will see all the voucher types available for purchase.  
Add the desired voucher(s) to your cart and complete the payment process.  

If you would like to become an admin with the ability to purchase vouchers for distribution in your company, please contact support to assign you the voucher admin role. Once the role is assigned, you may follow the above steps for making the purchase. See below in this FAQ for further information for admins.


Resources:

Adobe employee discount: Adobe employees pay $50 per certification exam. The price reduction will be automatic as long as you are logged in with your Adobe email. 

Student discount: Students are eligible for a 50% discount. Please contact our support team to validate your student status and receive your discount. 

Bulk discounts on vouchers: Everyone is eligible to receive a discount on bulk purchases of 10 or more vouchers. View this page for more details.

Adobe employee discount: Adobe employees pay $50 per certification exam. The price reduction will be automatic as long as you are logged in with your Adobe email.

Bulk discounts on vouchers: Everyone is eligible to receive a discount on bulk purchases of 10 or more vouchers. View this page for more details.

If you use a voucher to pay for an exam, and you cancel your exam more than 24 hours before your exam appointment, that voucher’s status will change to “Unused.” You may then use that voucher for a different exam. 

Don’t forget that if you have a scheduling conflict with your exam appointment, you can reschedule your exam.

If you use a voucher to pay for an exam, and you cancel your exam more than 24 hours before your exam appointment, that voucher’s status will change to “Unused.” You may then use that voucher for a different exam. 

Don’t forget that if you have a scheduling conflict with your exam appointment, you can reschedule your exam.

Don’t forget that if you have a scheduling conflict with your exam appointment, you can reschedule your exam.

Don’t forget that if you have a scheduling conflict with your exam appointment, you can reschedule your exam.

If you purchase a voucher at the time of scheduling, that voucher will always match the level of the exam you are scheduling.

If you already own multiple vouchers of varying levels, the voucher that matches the level of the exam will be automatically applied.

Professional, Expert, and Master level vouchers will only be applied to exams with a matching level. Adobe Universal vouchers can apply to any level.

To complete your renewal, you must take two short renewal modules (about 15 minutes each) for the highest-level certification you have attained in each Adobe Experience Cloud or Document Cloud application. When you have passed both modules, your certification will be renewed automatically.

However, some modules apply to more than one certification, so you may find that you end up needing to complete fewer than two modules per certification. 

  In addition, if you have multiple certifications in the same application, renewing the highest-level certification will automatically renew all of your lower-level certifications in that application. For example, if you have the Adobe Commerce Developer Expert and Adobe Commerce Developer Professional certification, renewing the Expert-level certification will automatically renew the Professional-level certification.  

  If you have certifications across two or more applications, you will need to pass two renewal modules for the highest-level certification for each application.

In addition, if you have multiple certifications in the same application, renewing the highest-level certification will automatically renew all of your lower-level certifications in that application. For example, if you have the Adobe Commerce Developer Expert and Adobe Commerce Developer Professional certification, renewing the Expert-level certification will automatically renew the Professional-level certification.  

  If you have certifications across two or more applications, you will need to pass two renewal modules for the highest-level certification for each application.

If you have certifications across two or more applications, you will need to pass two renewal modules for the highest-level certification for each application.

When your certification expires, the credential page where others can check the validity of your certification will show that your certification is no longer valid.

Have questions or comments? Visit our support section.

• To browse available courses, go to Courses > Course Catalog.
• Filter or search, then click on the course name to open the course details page.
• Click on a course module to expand it, then click Start.
• You will need to return to the course details page to continue to the next module.
• Be sure to complete all modules and take the course assessment and post-course survey to receive your course completion certificate!

• Go to My account > Courses tab.
• The Courses in progress widget lists all courses in progress.
• To resume a course, go to the Actions column and click Resume.

• Go to My Account > Achievements tab.
• Scroll down to the Completed courses widget.
• Under the Actions column, click Download certificate.

• Look up your exam in the Certification Catalog and click on the Learn more button.
• On the exam information page, go to the Schedule or take exam tab.
• Open the Schedule and pay for exam accordion.
• Under Schedule exam, click on the exam name link.
• If you do not already have a voucher in your account, you will need to purchase one by clicking on the Purchase voucher button and following the payment prompts.
• The Schedule exam button will now be available and you can choose your exam appointment date and time. You may also request accommodations at this time.

• Look up your exam in the Certification Catalog and click on the Learn more button.
• On the exam information page, go to the Schedule or take exam tab.
• Open the Reschedule or cancel your exam accordion.
• Click on the exam name link.
• Click on the Reschedule exam or Cancel exam button.

• Go to My Account > Certifications tab
• Scroll to the Completed Exams widget.
• You will find your downloadable score report in the Actions column.

• Go to My Account.
• Click on the Achievements tab.
• Your badges appear in your Trophy case, as well as in the Active certifications section.

• Go to My account.
• Click on the Achievements tab.
• Click on your badge. This will open the Credential page.
• Click on the logo for the social media account you would like to share to.

• Go to My account.
• Click on the Achievements tab.
• Scroll to the Active certifications widget.
Click on the Share button. This will open the Credential page.
Click on the logo for the social media account you would like to share to.
• Click on the Share button. This will open the Credential page.
• Click on the logo for the social media account you would like to share to.

• Go to the Adobe Certification Voucher Center.
• Under the Purchase vouchers tab, you will see all the voucher types available for purchase.
• Add the desired voucher(s) to your cart and complete the payment process.

• All major credit cards accepted.
• Companies may pay with a purchase order. For instructions, please see
    the question below: What is the process for paying with a Purchase Order?

• If the only voucher in your account is an Adobe Universal voucher, and you schedule a Professional exam, your Adobe Universal voucher will be applied to your Professional exam.
• If you have an Adobe Universal voucher and a Professional voucher in your account, and you schedule a Professional exam, your Professional voucher will be applied to your Professional exam.
• If you have an Expert voucher, and are trying to schedule a Professional exam, you will be prompted to purchase a Professional voucher.
